name: The Influence of the Blade
description:
Controls WASDMoveLeft Click (can hold down button)Shoot How to Play

Enemies will spawn at the edges of the arena. Killing an enemy will cause it to join you and if you have one or more enemies joined to you then your "influence" will build up. As this increases, you will be able to have more and more enemies joined to you at once. There are 10 waves to survive.

Credits

Sound effects made with BFXR (https://www.bfxr.net/) and JFXR (https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/)

Font - Press Start 2P by CodeMan38 (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P)
